item.description:
EVENT: A chance to learn about sailing out on the Charles. Community Boating is having an Open House and I am very happy to take any one from Mosaic who wants to join me out on a sail. We can cruise around on the River for a while and then go back into town for a late lunch. To get more information on Community Boating and directions to their marina see: http://www.community-...
TC: David â€“ dgoldsmith38@aol.com; calls on the day of the event 781-910-4154
RSVP: Preferred, rain will cancel, if you have any questions on the day of the event you can call the number listed above
Meet: 10:45 at Community Boating Inc (Right next to the Hatch Shell
along the Charles River)
Cost: $5.00 for non-members
item.how_to_find_us: Contact David for Details and I will have my Mosaic Hat on at the marina

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Sailing on The Charles
